query:
SELECT
                p.id as player_id,
                p.username,
                COUNT(v.id) as "village_count!: i64",
                COALESCE(SUM(v.population), 0) as "population!: i64"
            FROM players p
            LEFT JOIN villages v ON v.player_id = p.id
            GROUP BY p.id, p.username
            ORDER BY COALESCE(SUM(v.population), 0) DESC, p.username ASC
            LIMIT $1 OFFSET $2
